title.zh: 左钰洁获评WFH Susan Skinner Memorial Fund Scholarship
title.en: Yujie (Ruby) Zuo Awarded WFH Susan Skinner Memorial Fund Scholarship

subtitle.zh: 女性领导力能力建设荣誉

description.zh: 左钰洁获评世界血友病联盟（WFH）Susan Skinner Memorial Fund Scholarship。这是一个WFH官方女性领导力能力建设荣誉和项目，将以scholar/fellow/participant身份参与，致力于培养血友病领域的女性领导者，推动全球血友病事业的发展。
description.en: Yujie (Ruby) Zuo was awarded the World Federation of Hemophilia (WFH) Susan Skinner Memorial Fund Scholarship. This is an official WFH women's leadership capacity building honor and program, where she will participate as a scholar/fellow/participant, dedicated to cultivating female leaders in the hemophilia field and promoting the development of global hemophilia initiatives.
